generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, with vehicles driving on it.
- sidewalk: A paved sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the road, with a curb separating it from the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees are visible along both sides of the road and in the background, indicating dense vegetation.
- terrain: Grass and other low-lying vegetation are visible along the edges of the road and in the background, particularly on the left side.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and traffic infrastructure, appearing overcast.
- person: A person wearing a helmet and backpack is visible riding a bicycle on the sidewalk to the right.
- rider: The person on the bicycle is classified as a rider, as they are operating a bicycle.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a white van in the foreground and other vehicles ahead.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible suspended above the road, attached to poles.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic light and other signs along the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- building: A building is partially visible in the background on the right side of the road, behind the trees.
- wall: A low wall is visible along the edge of the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- fence: A fence is visible along the edge of the sidewalk on the right side of the road, behind the wall.
